description.compact: A list of tokenizers this sniff supports.
Returns an array of tokens this test wants to listen for.
Processes this test, when one of its tokens is encountered.

param.description: The position of the current token

comment.value: Check if the next non whitespace token is a string.
Make sure it is the only thing in the square brackets.
Allow indexes that have dots in them because we can't write
Token before the opening square bracket cannot be a var name.

description.compact: Registers the tokens that this sniff wants to listen for.
Called when one of the token types that this sniff is listening for is found.

docblock.param: file's token stack where the token was found.

return.description: Optionally returns a stack pointer. The sniff will not be

docblock.return: called again on the current file until the returned stack pointer is reached. Return (count($tokens) + 1) to skip the rest of the file.
